settings.heading: Campaign Overview
settings.text:
The "Tulips Silver Sale" is a festive promotional campaign celebrating Diwali with Tulips customers. The campaign period will run from 13th to 20th October 2025, during which 10 lucky winners will each receive a 10-gram Silver Coin.

There is NO MINIMUM PURCHASE requirement; all purchases from the official Tulips website during the campaign period are eligible. Winners will be chosen randomly and notified after the campaign ends.

settings.text:
‚ö†Ô∏è Important Legal Notice:

Under the Prize Competitions Act, 1955 and relevant promotional laws, "purchase and win" campaigns are generally allowed when no entry fee or purchase condition is mandatory.

However, specific states may restrict such campaigns or require additional approvals. These include:

Assam
Nagaland
Sikkim
Tamil Nadu
Andhra Pradesh
Telangana
Odisha

üì¢ Communication Guidelines:
